ygData.subject: Re: Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Your truly better off buying the armor instead of learning smithing to make it.  Smithing will suck up around 500 to 600 plat just to get it to the level that
ygData.messageBody:
Your truly better off buying the armor instead of learning smithing to make
it. Smithing will suck up around 500 to 600 plat just to get it to the
level that you might be able to make a tunic. This also takes a long long
time to do.

You can spend about 200 plat nowaydays, or less even to get a full set of
banded armor. So its your choice, just thought I would inform you of the
costs involved.

Dyvim Kincaid
Stormriders of Cazic Thule

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Dean Boyle [mailto:gino_14@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 7:49 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Armor
>
>
> From: "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...>
>
> You know the spell : Spirite of Wolf, well... I think this ring
> eather gives
> you the spell pernamently or add alot of agl. I don't really know couse
> some og my guild members are getting me a Shiny Brass Shield and
> 2 SOW rings
> and I'm planning a trip to freeport to pick it up, I'm lvl 12
> almost lvl 13
> so It's going to be a tough trip but I think I might be able to
> do it if I
> run stieght there with another high lvl character. So i should
> be expecting
> them around this friday ALSO when i hit freeport I'm going to
> start with my
> smithing skill couse Qeynos sucks for smithing and I need banded armor
> BADLY!!
>
> Dealan <The Light of Norrath> For the glory of Karana (The Rainkeeper). -
> Karana Server
>

> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>

> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Armor

>
> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> What is an SOW ring? I have heard of Journeyman Boots, but not SOW ring.
>
> > ----------
> > From: Jason Coan[SMTP:COANJ@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com

> > A SOW ring and bloodstained mantle give you wolf speed? where
> can I get
> > these items?
> >
> > >>> "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...> 5.24.99 9:19:33 PM >>>
> > From: "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...>
> >
> > Hail! I'm a human warrior (male) and what I've found to be good is a
> > spiked
> > collor. it's add's AC+3 and STG+3. I have 95stg and with that
> i have 98.
> > It's help alot! Also if you can get one SOW ring (adds lots to AGL) and
> > one
> > bloodsained mantle you'll be set and run fast as a wolf. I've
> also found
> > that onyx earrings add +2 to AGL witch helps out alot! There about 1pp
> > each
> > and Gnol Commanders tend to drop them.
> >
> >
> > ----Original Message Follows----
> > From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
> > Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > To: "'warriors_eq@onelist.com'" <warriors_eq@onelist.com>

> >
> > From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
> >
> > BAH! 130! try being a warrior with 75 str!
> >
> > Flesh band rings increase str by 2 and bloodstained mantle
> increase it by
> > 4.
> > Only thing I know off.
> >
> > How to make money, hmm patience. Im level 21 now and the mobs I fight
> > generally drop either platinum as loot or expensive items I can sell.
> >
> > By level 12 I had made about 80pp from trading and then another 100 by
> > level
> > 16 when I bought my banded. I made the money from player trading
> (selling
> > mino axes and dervish rings in qeynos and halas etc etc). I
> found this
> to
> > be tedious and no longer need to do that.
> >
> > > ----------
> > > From: Patricia Halas[SMTP:patty_halas@...]
